body:
@becker33 @scheibelp and others, please tell me how to do a better job writing 'spacky' spack code - this is the first time I have used spack's patch functionality. I did not make an issue to associate with this PR, but if you do
```console
$ spack install hdf5@1.8.10
``` 
you should be able to reproduce the compile errors that this patch fixes. The C language standard that hdf5 wants to be built with (ISO C90?) does not allow '//' comments, only '/* ... */'. Changing from the former to the latter is what the patches in this PR do.
title: adds patches required to build hdf5 1.8.10
